title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers to talk with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama and SentenceTransformers.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats with any Ollama model and supports slash commands.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with RxJS streams.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping the Ollama REST API with Tokio and Serde.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that proxies to Ollama with session memory and RAG switch.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP library for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed.
